name: Girls Hair Salon - Hairstyle & Makeup Party 2017
name_original: Girls Hair Salon - Hairstyle & Makeup Party 2017
description:
Welcome to the Kids Hair Art Salon where you will be our star stylist responsible for baby haircuts, Hollywood haircut style, makeovers, princess dress up and nail style. In this game you will be making wedding hair style, new fashion hair style, nail surgery and nail art. It is a Kids Hair Salon game with stylish hair accessories and beauty makeup tips.

The Kids Hair Art Salon is a makeover and princess dress up game. It is also for nail style and nail surgery. There are many wedding hair style, fashion hair style and Hollywood hair cut styles in this game. You can also perform baby haircuts as our star stylist. This Kids Hair Salon game is equipped with many princess hair do and beauty makeup tools.

Little girls and teens will love the Kids Hair Salon where they can do baby haircuts and Hollywood haircut style. The star stylist is responsible for makeovers, princess dressup, nail style and nail surgery. There are also wedding hair styles, new fashion hair styles and beauty makeup tricks to learn from this game.

Features:
• Latest hair styles and hair dos
• New fashion hair accessories
• Bright and colorful user interface
• Easy game play and lots of fun
